title: Uppercase string to lowercase
description: Write a programme to convert uppercase string to lowercase
contentHtml:
Write a programme to convert uppercase string to lowercase

Input  : HII THERE
Output : hii there

# Write a programme to convert uppercase string to lowercase

def uppercase_to_lowercase(string):
    return string.lower()


string = "HII THERE"
print("Input  :", string)
print("Output :", uppercase_to_lowercase(string))
markdown:
## Write a programme to convert uppercase string to lowercase

```txt
Input  : HII THERE
Output : hii there
```

---


<CodeBlock>
        
```python
# Write a programme to convert uppercase string to lowercase

def uppercase_to_lowercase(string):
    return string.lower()


string = "HII THERE"
print("Input  :", string)
print("Output :", uppercase_to_lowercase(string))

```
                
</CodeBlock>
